title: 'This is the end' Keir Starmer handed bleak leadership verdict as police raid Peter Mandelson's homes: 'Put him out of his misery!'
tags: Keir Starmer's allies warn leadership challenge risks economic chaos: 'It would be so irresponsible';GB News star furiously slaps down Labour MP after defending PM's 'integrity' amid Mandelson scandal;Gordon Brown slams PM for being 'too slow' on Mandelson and warns: 'Clean up or pay heavy price';The GB News Editorial Charter
